extract_options.tex: Convert all TEX files into images from specified directory in input
extract_options.singledir: Should all extracted files be put in one directory instead of their entry path
extract_options.usename: Use name from project.json as project subfolder name instead of id
extract_options.no_tex_convert: Don't convert TEX files into images while extracting PKG
extract_options.copyproject: Copy project.json and preview.jpg from beside PKG into output directory

info_options.info_tex: Dump info about all TEX files from specified directory

labels.exts_only: Only extract files with specified extensions (delimited by comma ","):
labels.exts_ignore: Don't extract files with specified extensions (delimited by comma ","):
labels.project_info: Keys to dump from project.json (delimit using comma) (* for all):
